item.title: Idunn
item.media:title: Idunn
item.media:description:
Instagram | Facebook | Shop 


(Music: Wardruna - Solringen)

In Norse mythology Iðunn (Idunna) the goddess of youth or rejuvenation. She was the keeper of the magic golden apples of immortality, which the gods must eat to preserve their youth.🍎

More Norse mythology:

item.title: [+Video] Commission - Nature Spirit
item.media:title: [+Video] Commission - Nature Spirit
item.media:description:
Colored sketch bust commission for LemoncakeII

 Time-lapse video available, click here to watch!  

I still struggle to draw messy bangs on the wind... Hmmmm
It's something I want to improve and that's why I draw them quite often~
Messy hair is very pretty depending the drawing, so I like the idea!
The pose was a bit random but I like the hands movements (⁄ ⁄>⁄ ▽ ⁄<⁄ ⁄)

• • •
Tablet Gaomon M106K | Paint Tool Sai | Edited in Photoshop (gaussian blur)
Art (c) Hyanna-Natsu | Character (c) LemoncakeII
Don't repost, copy, edit, sell or use without my permission.

Commissions info | FAQ | Redbubble | You Tube

I've uploaded EVERY TUTORIAL I've EVER MADE, and 1,000s of my REFERENCE SETS into one MASSIVE ENDLESS GALLERY, right HERE!

Lorenzo!

item.title: Anastasia
item.media:title: Anastasia
item.media:description:
If you would like to support my work and learn my process please consider supporting my  Patreon  and get exclusive content as rewards <3 

Hey guys!, Here is my Modern Anastasia, it was so fun to work on her, it was one of the movies I was obsessed as a kid, so it brought back all the memories. I hope you like it!. 
She is part of current Term 20! at my Patreon  . Video process, High Res, Color Palette, Psd file & more on this piece there as rewards.

Have a lovely day!

❤ Find me on: -  Youtube  -  Facebook  -  Tumblr   -  Prints   -  Instagram  -  Gumroad  -  Artstation   -  Twitter  



Others on the series

item.title: Jurassic Aftermath
item.media:title: Jurassic Aftermath
item.media:description:
Jurassic Aftermath - in a time following "Jurassic Park" and "Jurassic World".
One of two works I created for the Aurora Exibition III: Orange, www.projectaurora.art/exhibiti…

The idea for this image was born when I discussed with (I believe it was him) JayGraphixx about how in all the years on DA I never made a matte painting involving dinosaurs, although they generally fascinate me. I tried a new technique I picked up for matching tones and levels and I'm happy how "realistic" it turned out because of it, even though I used a lot of 3D material and plastic figures in the process. I also managed to sneak in a few pictures from my recent winter vacation.

As always, thanks for stopping by & I hope you like it!
Do check out the other amazing pieces of the Aurora exhibition!


Thanks to:
dinosaur 24 by jettstock | Dinosaur 2 by qroot-stock | Aucasaurus Running 01 and Brachiosaurus_01 by 2ndecho | Denver Botanical Dinosaur 112 by Falln-Stock | Ruined Building png. by DonkeySneakers | UNRESTRICTED - Petal Rain 02 by frozenstocks | other stock purchased from photobash.com, mattepaint.com or my own.
item.description:
Jurassic Aftermath - in a time following "Jurassic Park" and "Jurassic World".
One of two works I created for the Aurora Exibition III: Orange, www.projectaurora.art/exhibiti…

The idea for this image was born when I discussed with (I believe it was him) JayGraphixx about how in all the years on DA I never made a matte painting involving dinosaurs, although they generally fascinate me. I tried a new technique I picked up for matching tones and levels and I'm happy how "realistic" it turned out because of it, even though I used a lot of 3D material and plastic figures in the process. I also managed to sneak in a few pictures from my recent winter vacation.

As always, thanks for stopping by & I hope you like it!
Do check out the other amazing pieces of the Aurora exhibition!

item.title: Eclipse | Speedpaint
item.media:title: Eclipse | Speedpaint
item.media:description:
My little black angel. Gu. 

You taught me the courage of stars before you left 
How light carries on endlessly, even after death 
With shortness of breath, you explained the infinite 
How rare and beautiful it is to even exist

I wanted this particular song to be used here, because when I came back from Poland after a month, Gu seemed to be more loving towards my boyfriend and it hurt me that he does not come to me for purrs and cuddles. One day, I was showing my bf the song Saturn by Sleeping At Last, and somewhere around half of the song Gu came and lied down on my chest, purring. He licked my chin and soon after, he fell asleep. It was 7th of February. He kept coming to me couple of more times since.

On 11th of February he left us. Forever.

  


 speedpaint. 

Also, please check out the original creator of the cover I've used in the video.
He's a very, very talented artist and it's a shame he has a little over 150 subscribers only.

Moore Cover - Sleeping At Last // Saturn
item.description:
My little black angel. Gu. 

You taught me the courage of stars before you left 
How light carries on endlessly, even after death 
With shortness of breath, you explained the infinite 
How rare and beautiful it is to even exist

I wanted this particular song to be used here, because when I came back from Poland after a month, Gu seemed to be more loving towards my boyfriend and it hurt me that he does not come to me for purrs and cuddles. One day, I was showing my bf the song Saturn by Sleeping At Last, and somewhere around half of the song Gu came and lied down on my chest, purring. He licked my chin and soon after, he fell asleep. It was 7th of February. He kept coming to me couple of more times since.

On 11th of February he left us. Forever.

  


 speedpaint. 

Also, please check out the original creator of the cover I've used in the video.
He's a very, very talented artist and it's a shame he has a little over 150 subscribers only.

item.media:description:
PATREON  /  INSTAGRAM  /   GUMROAD  /  STORENVY  /   YOUTUBE  /  FACEBOOK  /   TWITTER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

New fashion for my OC character Verdun from my Manga Sometimes She's the Light.
He's the bad guy in my Story but has also a very deep and sad background story. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🎨Tools:
  • Faber Castell pencil 3B
  • Faber Castell Polygromo Black
  • Mechanical pencil B
  • Opaque white
  • standard copy paper
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  If you like my work you can support me with a Fav  and a Watch  so you will not miss a lot of goodies

item.title: Helena Private Beach
item.media:title: Helena Private Beach
item.media:description:
About
Character: Helena Douglas from Dead or Alive.
Swimsuit: Violet Fuzz from Dead or Alive Venus Vacation.
Rendered in: Marmoset Toolbag 3.05
Part of a Commission series.

3D models:
Helena Violet Fizz by Shuubaru , posed by me, and edited in blender by me.
Rocks constructed in blender by me.
Beach is a backdrop picture.

List of edits:
Made the skirt rest tightly over left leg with shrink wrap modifier. See no space between skirt and leg.
Modified the private parts of the swimsuit
Made belly button deeper
Created high-res version of the golden details on the bikini. Self torture with the pen tool in photoshop

Bonus Shots (0/3):
*behind looking out at sea
*from the side
*same angle as this, but zoomed out, full body.
(Note: Will release bonus shots when it has 600 favs)
item.description:

item.media:title: Cosplay Saber Nero
item.media:description:
Full set (including NSFW 18+ shots) is available on my Patreon until February 28th 2019 

As patreon exclusives I usually post some easy-to-make cosplays, fanservice, lingerie and boudoir sets or just lewds  

Wanna have full sets with 18+ pics? 
Feel free to check my Patreon for details!
Please notice that each set is available only during 1 month!

In this gallery I will post all the free previews for these sets, like I do in my Instagram  or Twitter

item.title: [GRAVESEND] - Varion Chamberlin
item.media:title: [GRAVESEND] - Varion Chamberlin
item.media:description:
__________________________________

[Pinterest] [Toyhouse] [Full App Image]


"I’ve been looking for you.."

__________________________________

NΛMЄ 〗Varion Chamberlin

ΛGЄ 〗27

GЄNDЄR & SЄX 〗Cis Male

ORIЄNTΛTION 〗Demiromantic Pansexual


WЄIGHT 〗 217 lb | 98 kg

HЄIGHT 〗 6’4” | 193 cm


OCCUPΛTION 〗Hunter


SPЄCIЄS 〗Human

[ABILITIES] N/A


__________________________________


[LIKЄS]

● Whisky (& most other dark liquors)

● Personal Space (literally stay away)

● Night time (the stars)



[DISLIKЄS]

● Weakness (in others but mostly in himself)

● Peace and quiet (prefers chaos)

● Talking about himself (Don’t ask)


[PЄRSONΛLITY]

Determined . Fearless . Inventive . Ruthless  . Aggressive . Condescending . Impatient

Varion is a do-it-yourself kind of guy, rarely seeking out any help or words of advice.. For anything. He tends to look down (literally, in some cases) on most people, judging them solely from a single once-over. Strength means a lot to him so if you show weakness- he will use it against you in his judgement.

He grew up rather pampered but it hasn’t really slowed him down from throwing himself into the worst of the worst for a hunt. His enjoyment of spilling blood has been a great motivator for his career choice.


__________________________________


[HISTORY]

When you grow up wealthy.. You learn to turn a blind eye to inexplicable happenings around you. They didn’t happen to you so why bother? Of course it’s so sad, so tragic- so heartbreaking what happened to those families. Those children. Those deaths, so unfortunate..

Money makes you happy, money makes everyone happy. Money means you’re better than everyone else- and you were.

Were.

It started with the disappearance of his sister, Charlotte. Then her reappearance a week later. Life almost returned to some semblance of normalcy- but of course, a false sense of security was all it turned out to be.

It didn’t hurt to cut down his sister in cold blood, to watch as blood pooled at her collarbone from the knife plunged deep into her chest cavity.. It didn’t hurt to see his parents lying lifelessly on the floor behind her, their throats ripped apart- their blood painting Charlotte’s face.

It didn’t hurt to walk away.

.. It especially didn’t hurt when she returned from the great beyond, healed and angry. But he was smarter, he learned things in her absence while she healed.. What she didn’t know was he was expecting her.

Killing her a second time was much.. Much sweeter.

--

While hunting brings him a sense of satisfaction, there’s always been.. Something wrong with his day to day. Something missing. Never staying in one place long Varion never encountered the same people more than once- well, unless they paid a pretty penny for his return.


Varion finds himself in Gravesend, following a lead only a hunter's eyes would see. A lycan attack written off as an animal attack.. How pitiful.

He’ll make sure the case is truly closed.

__________________________________

[TRIVIΛ]

● He regularly carries around his cane (equipped with a dagger and a sword that pulls from the handle), his pistol and various other knives hidden on his person.

● He primarily hunts lycanthrope and vampires- but he has encountered other.. Creatures of darkness.

● While he grew up wealthy, Varion left that life behind. He lives day to day with his earnings from hunting.


DISCORD ID 〗aimee !

[ ROLEPLAY PREFERENCES ]

Discord | Google Documents

HC | Script | LIT

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________


Varion Chamberlin © Aimee Ackerman

item.title: [ARPG] First Hunt
item.media:title: [ARPG] First Hunt
item.media:description:
Reposted from my ARPG account. I will be uploading choice pieces from that account as some of them I continue to argue are my best, or of a suitable quality to be included in my main gallery.
Some of these pieces have long since aged, but to some followers of mine, these were beloved and inspiring artworks to them.

The character, Aeon, belongs to me, but is currently being reworked into my own species, the Arvani.
The prong like applications on her face and canine like muzzle do not represent the Tyrian species accurately and are character specific. 
Tyrians belong to Kelyias & Eternityspool . 
I do not claim Tyrians, nor do I claim any part of the ARPG World-Of-Reos. 

____________________________________________________________________

COMMISSION INFORMATION  // FURAFFINITY // PICARTO // TWITTER

DESIGN TOS AND MASTERIST  // Complete Masterlist logging and TOS of all designs in my Gallery
DRAGON DESIGN HUB // For Trading /Reselling Assistance and Promotion

item.title: blondie (free raffle ! )
item.media:title: blondie (free raffle ! )
item.media:description:
HIIII EVERYONE!!! So in order to celebrate 800 + followers, I decided to host a raffle for you guys!!! Thank you so so much for all the support, it really means a LOT to me :,)

So, how does this raffle work? Well, let me explain it to you!


  How to enter -

- repost this post in either a journal, status, or poll with #fearable800
- PLEASE link your status/poll or journal in the comments!
- that’s it! ^^
- this will give you one entry! Drawing an oc of mine will give you 2, but is not mandatory!
- Here’s a link to all my characters!  

  Requirements -

- You must be watching me! New followers are always welcome ^^
- You must read my terms of service
- You must follow all the steps above in order to get a ticket
- please don’t follow me just for the raffle.. I love u guys and I’d be big disappoint

  

Thank you so much you guys!!
If you didn’t catch how to enter, scroll up! ^^

GOOD LUCK!!! 
 

This is cross posted on adopts amino, so please don't be shocked when given a high number!
